description: The elegant daughter of the Kamisato Clan, Ayaka is a Cryo sword user who excels at swift strikes and powerful AoE Cryo damage.
info: Ayaka is a top-tier Cryo DPS who excels at Freeze teams and AoE Cryo damage. Build her for CRIT, Cryo DMG, and ATK%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Kamisato Art - Kabuki
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash a flurry of sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Kamisato Art: Hyouka
skills.desc: Ayaka summons blooming ice, launching nearby enemies and dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Kamisato Art: Hyouka
Summons blooming ice, launching nearby enemies and dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

skills.name: Kamisato Art: Soumetsu
skills.desc: Ayaka releases a snowstorm, unleashing a series of icy slashes that deal massive AoE Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Kamisato Art: Soumetsu
Releases a snowstorm, unleashing a series of icy slashes that deal massive AoE Cryo DMG. Lasts for 5s.

passive_talents.name: Amatsumi Kunitsumi Sanctification
passive_talents.desc: After using Kamisato Art: Hyouka, Ayaka's Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.

passive_talents.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
passive_talents.desc: When Ayaka's Cryo attacks hit enemies, she restores 10 Stamina and gains 18% Cryo DMG Bonus for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Fruits of Shinsa
passive_talents.desc: When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Snowswept Sakura
constellations.desc: When Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to enemies, she has a 50% chance to decrease the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. Can occur every 0.1s.

constellations.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
constellations.desc: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional snowstorms, each dealing 20% of the original's DMG.

constellations.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Ebb and Flow
constellations.desc: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's snowstorm will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

constellations.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dance of Suigetsu
constellations.desc: Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This effect is cleared 0.5s after a Charged Attack hits.
